thread.title: Regional Sales Director - New York - Sports Media
thread.title_full: Regional Sales Director - New York - Sports Media

title: Regional Sales Director - New York - Sports Media
text: Posted/Updated: 10-21-2015 Brief Job Description: The Regional Director will be expected to be the expert on the local golf economy, which includes detailed knowledge of the golf courses, golf marketing outlets, market leaders, decision makers...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
